original_text: Every time that I pray for you, I ask God for a chance that I might visit you soon. I pray that he will make it possible if that is what he wants.
korean_text: 어떻게 하든지 이제 하나님의 뜻 안에서 너희에게로 나아갈 좋은 길 얻기를 구하노라

sentences.original_text: Every time that I pray for you
I ask God for a chance
that I might visit you soon
I pray that he will make it possible
if that is what he wants
